name: Corrupt Camera
description:
A Top-Down Shooter with a twist, The camera is out of control, forcing you to balance your focus on shooting your slimy enemies while dealing with the corrupt camera. This is my first ever completed original game and my second second game jam. This game is/was part of the GMTK Game Jam.

Controls:

Move- WASD

Shoot- LMB

Aim- Mouse
